column1: Little Goat Diner////On my last visit
column2: I had the pork torta. It is essentially cochinita pibil that they call "yucatan
column3: which seemed only different in the sense of they didn't slow roast it quite the same. The waitress was totally unprepared to talk about what yucatan" might have meant. I like it when we can have a little conversation about the taste of the dish and not just
column4: "It's liked stewed shredded pork on a bun. Yucatan style." Hmm.
